🌊 SEA 3: 9 new Fruits, new islands, new weapons, new secrets!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 2000
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Kilo, Smoke, Spin, Flame, Falcon, Ice, Sand, Dark, Diamond, Light, Love, Magma, Door, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier, String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, Dragon, and Venom!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans.","genre":""},{"creatorId":1226491,"creatorName":"RELL World","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1293589,"totalDownVotes":82426,"universeId":1511883870,"name":"[🎃 UPD + 2x EXP] Shindo","placeId":4616652839,"playerCount":58010,"imageToken":"T_4616652839_4a58","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔷 New Update:

🔨Contributions: Markosumisu, SwiftMerkz01, Rinanori, zakblak20, Iumu ","genre":""},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":4596877,"totalDownVotes":388551,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":80006,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

Long awaited naval adventure experience. 

Work towards your ideal build, discover hidden locations, and challenge difficult bosses while competing with others!

Scavenge the lands for treasure and exotic fruits known to empower their eaters. Hunt the pirates, or side with them. 

Perhaps you'll join a crew, or better yet, make one yourself.

Miscellaneous controls:
M-Menu
Ctrl-Climb
P-Sit on ship
WW-Sprint","genre":""},{"creatorId":29622,"creatorName":"callmehbob","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2377451,"totalDownVotes":315195,"universeId":321778215,"name":"👻Royalloween👻 Royale High","placeId":735030788,"playerCount":30070,"imageToken":"T_735030788_21f6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"High up on the hill sits a mysterious manor.. 
In celebration of your untimely visit, the Halloween festivities have been extended until Nov 15th!

Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡","genre":""},{"creatorId":3194064,"creatorName":"Bizarre Studios®","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":662392,"totalDownVotes":73785,"universeId":1016936714,"name":"『🎃』Your Bizarre Adventure ","placeId":2809202155,"playerCount":18307,"imageToken":"T_2809202155_cd90","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"✨🏹『NEW UPDATE v0.885』 🏹✨
➢ HALLOWEEN EVENT 🎃 ENDS ON 11/07
➢ COLLECT CANDY
➢ LIMITED HALLOWEEN ITEMS, COSMETICS & STAND SKINS
➢ NEW STAND SKINS
➢ 2 NEW CODES ON UZUKEE YOUTUBE
➢ BALANCES FIXES & CHANGES
➢ and more

Welcome to Your Bizarre Adventure, an RPG-styled game that revolves around obtaining strong and unique spiritual abilities known as "STANDS", fighting gangs, and more! Read the help section in-game! JOIN OUR COMMUNITY'S SERVER LINK BELOW FOR CODES, UPDATES, ANNOUNCEMENTS, AND MORE HELP!

Give the game page a thumbs-up like and subscribe to our Youtube below for more codes:
➢ youtube.com/channel/UCwxB9DjiJKOcZbDPIvsCZBg?sub_confirmation=1

Arrivederci!","genre":""},{"creatorId":63700903,"creatorName":"Coeptus","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3673416,"totalDownVotes":362668,"universeId":88070565,"name":"Welcome to Bloxburg","placeId":185655149,"playerCount":27331,"imageToken":"T_185655149_9e67","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":25,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build and design your own amazing house, own cool vehicles, hang out with friends, work, roleplay or explore the city of Bloxburg. The possibilities are endless!

Version: 0.10.0
Update Log: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/--/361910","genre":""},{"creatorId":6556072,"creatorName":"Universe Time Studio","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":456775,"totalDownVotes":75547,"universeId":1782832995,"name":"A Universal Time","placeId":5130598377,"playerCount":13095,"imageToken":"T_5130598377_12c","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"❗ Welcome to A Universal Time ❗
🔮A Universal Time (AUT) is an action/adventure game inspired by many different popular shows, games, and animes. Most notably the Shōnen Jump Anthology's 'JoJo's Bizarre Adventure'.

📰 Current news:
- RANKED SEASON 2.
- NEW GAMEMODE
- ADDED BROLY
- NEW 1V1S MAP
- NEW AURAS
- NEW EMOTES
- NEW DASH ANIMATION, VISUAL CHANGES, ETC
- A LOT OF FIXES AND BALANCES

🔊Sounds are sourced from a majority of open libraries and our sound designers. These can be removed upon legitimate request.🔊","genre":""},{"creatorId":4217910,"creatorName":"YXCeptional Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2669734,"totalDownVotes":799537,"universeId":703124385,"name":"Tower of Hell","placeId":1962086868,"playerCount":49624,"imageToken":"T_1962086868_5fcb","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you be the first to the top in this randomly generated obby with absolutely no checkpoints at all?



Owners of VIP-Servers can use the settings menu to skip rounds, set the tower size and lock the shop.

For support go to support.yx.zone","genre":""},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":476343,"totalDownVotes":236076,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":19354,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats"","genre":""},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1360210,"totalDownVotes":77183,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":16138,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Grow your own swarm of bees, collect pollen, and make honey in Bee Swarm Simulator! Meet friendly bears, complete their quests and get rewards! As your hive grows larger and larger, you can explore further up the mountain. Use your bees to defeat dangerous bugs and monsters. Look for treasures hidden around the map. Discover new types of bees, all with their own traits and personalities!

Join Bee Swarm Simulator Club for free Honey, Treats and Codes!: https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=3982592","genre":""},{"creatorId":3059674,"creatorName":"Badimo","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4650779,"totalDownVotes":629450,"universeId":245662005,"name":"Jailbreak","placeId":606849621,"playerCount":14298,"imageToken":"T_606849621_25a8","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🏎 NASCAR is officially coming to Jailbreak SOON! Stay tuned!

Hi everybody! Our Fall Update is here!
🏁 Season 6! Race to the top! With easier contracts, more prizes!
💥 Seasonal Global Leaderboards!
🎉 Admin Commands for VIP-Servers!! Press "`" to activate. Type help in the command box for help!
🔥 Item dropping! Finally! Press backspace to drop.
🍁 Fall Map with improved lighting!
Thank you as always for supporting us! Use code fall2021 for some cash!

🏆 Jailbreak is an award-winning game played over five billion times where you can orchestrate a robbery or stop the criminals before they get away! Team up with friends for even more fun and plan the ultimate raid or heist. What role will you play? 

🖥 Programmed by Badcc. @badccvoid
🎨 Designed by asimo3089.  @asimo3089","genre":""},{"creatorId":12363692,"creatorName":"Trendsetter Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":331241,"totalDownVotes":45692,"universeId":2934375089,"name":"Squid Game 🎃 EVENT","placeId":7549229959,"playerCount":28870,"imageToken":"T_7549229959_e629","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🎃 HALLOWEEN UPDATE! 🎃

🌟 Next code at 350k likes! 🌟

💰 Join Trendsetter Games (Check the game developer!) for 100 cash.
💰 Join UCR for (https://www.roblox.com/groups/18/UCR) for 200 cash!

🦑 Hey there! You got yourself in some debt and this seems like your only way out. Play the game fairly and don't break any rules, or you'll be 'eliminated'. It is strongly recommended that you forge alliances to survive the intermission nights in-order to win the game. Inspired by the Netflix show Squid Game!

","genre":""},{"creatorId":2782840,"creatorName":"Chillz Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1759077,"totalDownVotes":141108,"universeId":210851291,"name":"Build A Boat For Treasure","placeId":537413528,"playerCount":20855,"imageToken":"T_537413528_d6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build your ship and set sail for your adventure!

--- 300% more health!

--- 300% more health!
--- 25% more gold!","genre":""},{"creatorId":6639766,"creatorName":"Century Makers","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":483223,"totalDownVotes":49464,"universeId":2549475383,"name":"Livetopia🏰 Halloween!","placeId":6737970321,"playerCount":45642,"imageToken":"T_6737970321_b832","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"____💡 UPDATE 26 💡____
